content: Canine Behavior Specialist

Hiring a canine behavior specialist can help dog owners address behavioral issues with their pets. This solution involves a specialist working one-on-one with the dog and owner to identify the root cause of the issue and develop a personalized training plan to improve behavior.
Personalized training plans, one-on-one sessions, behavior analysis, positive reinforcement techniques, ongoing support
Cesar Millan, Victoria Stilwell, Zak George, Karen Pryor, Patricia McConnell
Our solution focuses on providing personalized training plans that cater to the specific needs of each dog and owner, with ongoing support to ensure continued improvement.
Virtual Dog Training

Virtual dog training allows dog owners to access personalized training plans and coaching from the comfort of their own home. This solution involves an online platform that offers virtual sessions with a dog behavior specialist, as well as training resources and tools.
Virtual coaching sessions, personalized training plans, behavior tracking tools, interactive training resources, ongoing support
Doggy Dan, Pupford, Kikopup, Zak George, Victoria Stilwell
Our solution offers personalized virtual coaching sessions with a canine behavior specialist, as well as interactive training resources and tools for ongoing support.
Dog Walking Harness

A dog walking harness is a specialized harness designed to address issues such as leash pulling and aggressive behavior during walks. This solution involves using a specific type of harness that provides better control over the dog's movements and reduces negative behavior during walks.
Anti-pull design, adjustable sizing, padded straps, reflective material, durable construction
Halti Harness, Sporn Harness, Easy Walk Harness, Ruffwear Front Range Harness, Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Harness
Our solution focuses on providing a high-quality, durable harness with an anti-pull design and adjustable sizing for maximum control and comfort during walks.
Dog Calming Treats

Dog calming treats are a natural solution for managing behavioral issues such as anxiety and aggression in dogs. This solution involves using treats that are formulated with natural ingredients such as chamomile and valerian root to promote relaxation and reduce stress levels in dogs.
Natural ingredients, chewy texture, delicious flavors, calming effects, easy to administer
Zesty Paws Calming Bites, PetHonesty Calming Hemp, Pawlife Calm Pup, Blue Buffalo Calming Treats, VetriScience Composure Treats
Our solution focuses on providing dog owners with a delicious and effective way to manage their pets' behavioral issues, using high-quality, natural ingredients for maximum safety and effectiveness.
